name: Boss Market
summary: Step into Boss Market, an exciting arcade idle game designed for Meta Quest. Build your business empire, make smart investments, and watch your wealth grow! Manage resources, unlock new opportunities, and strategize to dominate the market. With immersive VR mechanics and engaging gameplay, Boss Market challenges you to rise from a startup to a corporate giant. Are you ready to become the ultimate business tycoon? Play now and rule the market!
